name: Red Brick Ventures
overview:
Red Brick Ventures is an incubation and acceleration platform dedicated to unleashing the entrepreneurial potential of Japan.

Our team has spent decades observing management practices and macroeconomic trends in Japan and holds a firm belief that Japanâ€™s greatest asset is its highly developed, highly trained, and extremely diligent human capital resources. We know that a current and future crop of entrepreneurial CEOs will emerge given the proper platform.

Red Brick Ventures brings together ideas, capital, and would-be entrepreneurs behind the safety of our red brick walls. We invent and source original consumer tech ideas from all over the world, and fund development of them for the Japan market through initial iterations, go to market, and post-launch. In risk-averse Japanese corporate culture, we break down the barriers to innovation and make it easier for talented Japanese would-be entrepreneurs to take the plunge into a startup by taking steps to reduce personal, legal and reputation risk. These include financial support and hands-on mentoring by Red Brick Ventures partners and executives of our venture capital co-investors, as well as access to our world-class network.
